options.text: She is cooking chopped string beans

options.text: He is making bread at the store

options.text: She is writing a letter to her friend

options.text: I did the laundry this morning

options.text: He is going to the market

options.text: They are eating breakfast in the evening
They are having dinner in the morning

questions.title: Waray: Simple Errand
questions.question: What does "Mapalit ako hin gatas." mean?

questions.title: Bicol: Short Conversations
questions.question: What does "Nagtaram siya sa maestro." mean?

questions.question: What does "Lumwal ya king balay." mean?

options.text: He went out of the house

questions.question: What does "Nanlapus la ed klase." mean?

questions.title: Bisaya: Short-term Plans
questions.question: What does "Mohawa ko sa trabaho ugma." mean?

questions.title: Maguindanao: Statement with Emotion
questions.question: What does "Nalipay ako sa imo tabang." mean?

options.text: I am angry with your help
I am happy with your help
I am confused by your help

questions.title: Tagalog: Advanced Verb Tenses
questions.description: Identify correct aspect of the verb
questions.question: What does "Makikinig siya sa lektura bukas ng umaga." mean?

options.text: He is listening to the lecture now
He listened to the lecture earlier
He will listen to the lecture tomorrow morning

questions.title: Cebuano: Passive Voice Construction
questions.question: What does "Gipalit ang libro sa tindahan." mean?

options.text: The book was bought at the store
They sold a book to the store
Someone is looking for a book

questions.title: Ilocano: Complex Sentence Structure
questions.question: What does "Kalpasan ti agtinnulongda, immayda idiay balay." mean?

options.text: They arrived at home then helped
After helping each other, they came home
They went home to ask for help

questions.title: Waray: Contextual Meaning
questions.question: What does "Waray siya umabot ha klase tungod han bagyo." mean?

options.text: He didn’t attend class because of the storm
He was teaching during the storm

questions.title: Hiligaynon: Conditional Action
questions.question: What does "Kon indi siya magtuon, indi siya makapasar." mean?

options.text: If he doesn’t study, he won’t pass
He is being forced to pass

questions.title: Kapampangan: Future Perfect
questions.question: What does "Mekapagluto na ku bayu ka dumating." mean?

options.text: I will start cooking when you arrive
I will have finished cooking before you arrive
I started cooking as you arrived

questions.title: Pangasinan: Hypothetical Scenario
questions.question: What does "No agkakatuwa ya, di na mantaray." mean?

options.text: If he’s not happy, he won’t go
He won’t eat if he’s late

questions.title: Bicol: Expressing Regret
questions.question: What does "Sayang, dai ko nadara an payong." mean?

options.text: Too bad, I didn’t bring the umbrella

questions.title: Bisaya: Past Intention
questions.question: What does "Unta miadto ko sa simbahan apan nalimot ko." mean?

options.text: I’m going to the church now
I was supposed to go to church but I forgot
I saw the church and remembered

questions.title: Maguindanao: Verb + Honorific Usage
questions.question: What does "Ginagalang ko su panugunan nin kangilalagan." mean?

options.text: I respect the guidance of the elder

questions.title: Cebuano: Cultural Context
questions.question: What does "Gipaningkamotan niya nga malipay ang iyang ginikanan." mean?

options.text: He wants his parents to leave
He tried hard to make his parents happy
He sent money to his parents

questions.title: Ilocano: Subtle Tone
questions.question: What does "Awan ti agbuybuya ti sinematayo." mean?

options.text: No one is watching our movie

questions.title: Hiligaynon: Polite Requests
questions.question: What does "Pwede bala ko makapangayo sang bulig?" mean?

questions.title: Waray: Combining Time and Action
questions.question: What does "Han natapos an klase, kinadto hiya ha library." mean?

options.text: After class ended, he went to the library

questions.title: Pangasinan: Disagreement Phrase
questions.question: What does "Agko panangaro ed desisyonna." mean?

options.text: I do not agree with his decision

questions.title: Bicol: Sequential Events
questions.question: What does "Pagkatapos maglinis, nagluto siya nin hapunan." mean?

options.text: He forgot to clean and cook

questions.title: Bisaya: Expressing Uncertainty
questions.question: What does "Murag wala siya kasabot sa giistorya." mean?

options.text: It seems he didn’t understand what was said

questions.title: Kapampangan: Verb Tense Identification
questions.question: What does "Eya agpang keng sinabi nang Maria." mean?

options.text: He does not agree with what Maria said

questions.title: Kapampangan: Family Role

questions.translation: Maria is Juan’s mother.

questions.title: Cebuano: Weather Identification

questions.question: Hiya nag-___ han irimnan.

questions.translation: Use the pan for cooking.

questions.title: Tagalog: Nature Term

questions.question: Ang ___ misinggit og kusog.
questions.translation: The dog barked loudly.

questions.translation: I will arrive in the morning.

questions.translation: Please bring the mattress to the room.

questions.title: Hiligaynon: Action Verb
questions.question: Gusto ko mag-___ sang tubig.
questions.translation: I want to drink water.

questions.title: Maguindanao: Emotion Word
questions.description: Choose the correct word expressing emotion.

questions.translation: He/She is already afraid of the war.

questions.title: Pangasinan: Tool Word
questions.description: Choose the word related to a tool.

questions.translation: He/She is already afraid of the war.

questions.title: Tagalog: Location Inside a House

questions.translation: The remote is on the table.

questions.title: Cebuano: Time of Day
questions.question: Molakaw ko kada ___.
questions.translation: I leave every morning.

questions.title: Hiligaynon: Part of the Body
questions.question: Nagmasakit ang akon ___.
questions.translation: My stomach hurts.

questions.title: Waray: Action in School

questions.translation: He wrote the assignment.

questions.title: Ilocano: Nature Object
questions.description: Choose the correct word related to nature.
questions.question: Adda kami iti ___ idiay bukid.
questions.translation: We were under a tree in the mountain.

questions.title: Kapampangan: Feeling Word
questions.question: Makanyan yang ___ pamung makanya.
questions.translation: That shows love.

questions.title: Maguindanao: Activity Word
questions.question: So bata na ___ ed labas.
questions.translation: The child is playing outside.

questions.title: Pangasinan: Food Name
questions.description: Choose the correct word for food.
questions.question: Kanen mi ya ___.
questions.translation: We ate some snacks.

questions.title: Bisaya: Part of the Day
questions.question: Matulog ko kada ___.
questions.translation: I sleep every night.

questions.title: Bicol: Emotion or Feeling
questions.question: Siya masyado nang ___.
questions.translation: He is very happy now.

questions.title: Tagalog: Figurative Language

questions.title: Cebuano: Proverb Completion

questions.question: Ang taong ___, dali rang masuko.

questions.title: Ilocano: Descriptive Adjective

questions.question: Daydiay nga lalaki ket ___.

questions.title: Bicol: Metaphorical Action

questions.title: Waray: Rare Noun

questions.title: Maguindanao: Spiritual Concept

questions.title: Kapampangan: Philosophical Term

questions.question: Atin yang lalalam a ___.
questions.translation: He has a deeper meaning.

questions.title: Pangasinan: Rare Verb
questions.question: Ag ___ tolay ed gabi.
questions.translation: The person rushed through the night.

questions.title: Bisaya: Old Sayings

questions.translation: He who is not afraid is close to danger.

questions.title: Hiligaynon: Uncommon Object

questions.translation: He brought his grandfather's cage.

questions.translation: The blacksmith used the hammer.

questions.translation: She wore a patadyong.

questions.title: Ilocano: Deep Emotion

questions.title: Bicol: Conceptual Noun

questions.title: Waray: Environmental Term
